short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple Flappy Bird game as a Chrome extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Flappy-Pokemon is a fun and addictive chorme extention game that combines the classic gameplay of Flappy Bird with the beloved characters from the Pokemon universe. Fly through a series of obstacles and try to achieve the highest score while guiding your chosen Pokemon to victory!
